body.name: Rapoo Silent Wired Mouse, 1000 DPI 5ft Cord Quiet Button Optical Computer Mouse, Left Right Hand Use, for Laptop Chromebook Mac Notebook, Matte Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 39 mins
features: ✅Silent Mouse - Reduced click sound and same click feel eliminates noise and distractions for you and others around you.

✅DURABLE & ERGONOMIC SHAPE - 5,000,000 times clicks using experience brings long life span. Symmetrical Design makes it convenient for both left and right hands, streamline shell is very comfortable to use it all day
✅High-definition-1000 DPI tracking engine. Enjoy responsive and smooth cursor control with the 1000 DPI high-definition optical tracking engine

✅Anti-slip and Silent Scroll-The grille anti-slip pattern on the scroll wheel ensures fast, easy and accurate scrolling. Almost little noise when you slowly scroll it. Please note: Middle button click is not quiet.
✅Quality Guaranteed & One Year Warranty- We are the designer and manufacturer for Rapoo mouse and keyboards, we have been engaged to providing the best products to our customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great but didn't like it
reviews.reviewText: This mouse works great. It's very responsive. It's a nice size for a hand - not an overly big, full sized mouse but more of a compact size. I'm giving it a 5 star review because it is a good mouse for someone who is looking for a mouse that is as lightweight as air. It's so lightweight, it's lighter than a piece of paper. It's also silent. You can barely hear or feel the clicking. Overall, this mouse is not for me and I'm returning it. I like a mouse with more weight and definitely loud clicking noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and is quiet!
reviews.reviewText: It works well, looks nice and is actually quiet!It's very light weight which is a pro or a con depending on the person.Worth the price. I'm satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is quieter but is not silent.
reviews.reviewText: The price is good. It came in two days. I've used it for a few days. It does make a soft sound when you press a button. It is quieter than my previous mouse. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really works on the latest macOS
reviews.reviewText: Funny thing, this mouse came in a box that said the system requirements included various versions of Windows, not Mac. But it's thoroughly Mac-compatible.After my Mac Mini failed and I bought a new one with an M1 chip and the latest OS, I had problems with every mouse I had. Either it would stop working when I woke the Mac from sleep (and I had to unplug it and plug it in again), or scrolling with the scroll wheel was totally wrong, or—the only mouse that didn't have these problems, the Logitech B100—it was black, and I want a white mouse. This one, the Rapoo M100, met all my conditions.The only problem I've had with it is that on my favorite mouse pad, which is mostly black with closely spaced white lines in various directions (it's a montage of zebras), it sometimes doesn't respond to small movements. It works well on a half-sheet of white paper—I'm getting a new mouse pad. Works best with solid color pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for! No annoying clicks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually a great mouse
reviews.reviewText: It's been a long time since I bought a wired mouse, but this time I was looking for something on a budget.But in reality this Rapoo really surprised me - it feels really nice i the palm and moves the cursor very smoothly. The scrolling wheel has little indentations across, so it's easy to scroll with a index finger.The only thing that it does not have a protective sleeve at the point where the cable gets outs, that the point where the cable got broke on my previous mouse, since it gets bent a lot at that point.I will see how long it last. It's a pity that you can't leave a review several years after you bought a product, since only over the time the quality products show off. It's is not the features that matter, a lot of cheap Chinese products have them, it is how they work over time. The features do not matter if the thing is broken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I "needed" a wired mouse and this one was I expensive, nice sized, I have big hands, and it was delivered FAST.Thank you guys GREAT JOB!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse, until it stops working
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mouse that does what it says it will do for about two years. The scroll wheel and clicker parts are quiet and it fits nicely in my hand. Unfortunately, the scroll wheel stops working well after about 2 years of use. I tried opening the mouse to clean the scroll wheel, but that didn't help. I did end up replacing it with the same version, so I clearly like this enough to buy again...I just wish I didn't have to.

reviews.reviewTitle: good and the price is reasonable
reviews.reviewText: Quiet and clickable mouse, nice product

reviews.reviewTitle: Por ese precio no puedes pedir más
reviews.reviewText: Por 4,38€ no creo que encuentres nada mejor, es lo que es y punto, un ratón económico sin ningún tipo de botón extra, no se le pueden cambiar los DPI desde el propio ratón, si quieres hacer que vaya más lento o más rápido tienes que hacerlo desde el sistema operativo, tampoco os esperéis un super ratón como he leído en otros lados, no es ninguna maravilla pero para el precio que tiene es suficiente para un uso normal, si lo quieres para jugar yo no lo recomiendo porque no es muy preciso para eso, pero si lo quieres para navegar y poco más como es mi caso, es más que suficiente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just a mouse no problems at all.
